Rain Bakal Terima Penghargaan Internasional di AS
01 Nov 2019, 01:55 by , https://www.facebook.com/CNNIndonesia


Jung Ji-hoon atau lebih dikenal sebagai Rain akan menerima penghargaan khusus di AS, 5 November mendatang. (Foto: Screenshot via instagram (@rain_oppa)

Jakarta, CNN Indonesia -- Aktor dan penyanyi Rain terpilih untuk menerima penghargaan di US-Asia Entertainment Summit & Game Changer yang diadakan oleh Asia Society Southern California (ASSC)  tahun ini. Acara tersebut akan diadakan pada 5 November mendatang di Los Angeles. The Summit adalah konferensi yang mempromosikan kerja sama antara tokoh-tokoh penting industri hiburan di Hollywood dan Asia. Para pembuat film, konten, dan orang-orang yang membuat kesepakatan yang berdampak di bidang film, musik, gim, dan konten digital dari seluruh Asia disebut akan berkumpul di acara itu. Dalam acara tersebut, Rain adalah artis Korea pertama yang menerima penghargaan Entertainment Game Changer. Ia tak sendiri, ada pula penyanyi dan aktor China-Amerika Wang Leehom, serta presiden Walt Disney Imagineering Bob Weis, dan Zhang Wei presiden dari Alibaba Pictures.Asia Society Southern California's Summit dilaksanakan pada jamuan makan malam mengikuti jadwal US-Asia Summit. Memasuki tahun ke-10, US-Asia Summit terfokus pada hubungan antar kedua negara. Kali ini, mereka memberik perhatian lebih luas, bukan hanya antara Amerika Serikat dan China, tetapi meliputi seluruh Asia. Rain yang bernama asli Jung Ji-Hoon merupakan aktor, penyanyi, serta produser musik asal Korea Selatan. Selama karier ia telah merilis tujuh album dan kerap mengadakan tur dunia. Ia mendapatkan ketenaran lewat album ketiga yang berjudul It's Raining. Pada tahun 2008 ia debut di Hollywood dengan tampil di film Speed Racer. Ia kemudian meraih lebih banyak ketenaran setelah membintangi Ninja Asassin, dan berhasil menjadi artis Korea pertama yang memenangkan MTV Awards. Rain menikahi aktris Kim Tae-hee pada tahun 2017 setelah berpacaran selama 5 tahun menjalin hubungan. Kedua pasangan ini baru saja dikaruniai anak kedua pada bulan September lalu. (kir/rea)

Rain Will Receive International Awards in the US
01 Nov 2019, 01:55 by, https://www.facebook.com/CNNIndonesia


Jung Ji-hoon or better known as Rain will receive a special award in the US on November 5. (Photo: Screenshot via Instagram (@rain_oppa)

Jakarta, CNN Indonesia - Actor and singer Rain was chosen to receive an award at the US-Asia Entertainment Summit & Game Changer held by the Asian Society of Southern California (ASSC) this year. The event will be held on November 5 in Los Angeles. The Summit is a conference that promotes collaboration between key figures in the entertainment industry in Hollywood and Asia. Filmmakers, content, and people who make deals that have an impact on film, music, games and digital content from all over Asia are said to be gathering at the event. During the event, Rain was the first Korean artist to receive the Entertainment Game Changer award. He is not alone, there are also Chinese-American singer and actor Wang Leehom, and Walt Disney Imagineering president Bob Weis, and Zhang Wei president of Alibaba Pictures. The Society of Southern California's Summit was held at a dinner following the US-Asia Summit schedule. Entering its 10th year, the US-Asia Summit is focused on relations between the two countries. This time, they gave wider attention, not only between the United States and China, but covered all of Asia. Rain, whose real name is Jung Ji-Hoon, is a South Korean actor, singer and music producer. During his career he has released seven albums and often toured the world. He gained fame through his third album, It's It's Raining. In 2008 he debuted in Hollywood by appearing in the film Speed Racer. He later won more fame after starring in Ninja Asassin, and managed to become the first Korean artist to win the MTV Awards. Rain marries actress Kim Tae-hee in 2017 after dating for 5 years in a relationship. The two couples had just been blessed with a second child last September. (kir / rea)
